titles.title: Fighting Foreign Influence Act
Fighting Foreign Influence Act
Congressional and Executive Foreign Lobbying Ban Act
Stop Foreign Donations Affecting Our Elections Act
Think Tank and Nonprofit Foreign Influence Disclosure Act
To provide for disclosures of certain foreign contributions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
